attributes.action: allow us to chose our water suppliers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we can chose the company that we want to supply our  electricity,and gas which means we have some control over the price that we pay, but when it comes to water, we have to pay whatever our local suppliers tell us we must pay. in the south west we pay more than any other region, it is time we were treated equaly and given a choice.
